about_the_game:
Scourgefall is a challenging roguelike inspired by Magicite, with a huge variety in gameplay and customization, allowing for near endless combinations as players create characters, explore procedurally generated stages, and battle against the relentless Scourge.

Permadeath & Replayability

Survive the treacherous depths of procedurally generated caves where death is permanent, ensuring every decision matters. With each new character, experience a new and unique challenge with changing levels and different loadouts!

The Scourge

Feel the mounting tension as you race against time before the dreaded Scourge invasion. Strategize your exploration to maximize efficiency while preparing for the inevitable onslaught of empowered foes.

Character Customization

Craft your unique hero: selecting from various races, hats, companions, traits, and attribute points. Define your playstyle and adapt to the ever-changing environments with a character tailored to your preferences.

Challenging Combat

Engage in fast-paced, skill-based combat against a diverse array of enemies lurking in the depths. Master your abilities and wield a vast arsenal of weapons and magic to conquer the perils that await.

Progression System

Grow stronger the deeper you delve. Discover new abilities, upgrade equipment, and unlock powerful enchantments. Adapt your strategy and playstyle to overcome increasingly daunting challenges while losing everything if you perish. Unlock new Races, Hats or Companions with each Challenge mastered for your future adventures.

Items & Crafting

Uncover a wealth of resources and rare treasures as you explore the depths. Utilize a robust crafting system to forge weapons, armor, potions, and more; allowing for endless customization and experimentation.

Town Hub

Seek refuge in bustling towns between your perilous expeditions. Rest, replenish supplies, and interact with NPCs to trade goods, receive quests, and uncover valuable insights into the world around you.

Multiplayer

Brave the depths alone or team up with friends in thrilling multiplayer adventures. Coordinate your efforts, share resources, and face the challenges of Scourgefall together in cooperative gameplay.

Texturepack- & Modsupport

Unleash your creativity with robust modding support, allowing you to customize your gameplay experience to your heart's content. Dive into a vibrant community of creators and share your creations with players worldwide.

How deep can you delve?
